headline: Micron Ships HBM4 to Key Customers to Power Next-Gen AI Platforms
summary: Micron HBM4 36GB 12-high products lead the industry in power efficiency for data center and cloud AI acceleration A Media Snippet accompanying this announcement is available in this link. BOISE, Idaho, June 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The importance of high-performance memory has never been greater, fueled by its crucial role in supporting the growing demands of AI training and inference workloads in data centers.
